1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David ayic ix el vin̈ elelal d'a vin̈aj Absalón, aton yuninal.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, tzijtum eb' anima ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin, tzijtum eb' smeltzajoch vajc'ooloc.</t>
2: <t>Tzijtum eb' tz'alani to man̈ ol in a colo'.</t>
3: <t>A achxo Mamin, in Columal ach, uuj tzin tzalaji. A ach tzac' in tec'anil.</t>
4: <t>A tzin avaj d'ayach, tzin a tac'vej d'a jun tzalan b'aj syal sb'a eb' anima d'ayach.</t>
5: <t>Tzin ec' jichan, tzin vayb'ati, te vach' tz'aj yel in vayan̈, yujto a ach tzin a tan̈vej.</t>
6: <t>Man̈ ol in xivlaj yuj jantac anima ac'um oval molaneq'ui, yuj eb' oyanec' d'a in patic vichan̈ tic.</t>
7: <t>Mamin Jehová, ochan̈ ved'oc. Ach in Diosal, colinn̈ej. A ach ol a mac'poj sti' eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin. Man̈xalaj jab'oc ol elc'och spoder eb' sc'ulan chucal chi'.</t>
8: <t>Mamin Jehová, a achton tzach colvajn̈ej. Ac' a nivan vach'c'olal d'a quib'an̈ a on̈ a chon̈ab' on̈ tic.</t>
